meanings.definition: A person or device that falsifies information or pretends to be someone else.
meanings.sent1: The spoofer sent fake emails pretending to be the boss.
meanings.sent2: I heard about a spoofer who hacked into people's accounts.
meanings.sent3: The spoofer tried to trick everyone by pretending to be a famous celebrity.
meanings.sent4: The spoofer's actions were like a chameleon, blending into different identities.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the spoofer, they can easily deceive you with false information.

meanings.definition: A program or tool used to manipulate or deceive others online.
meanings.sent1: Make sure to install an antivirus to protect against spoofer software.
meanings.sent2: The spoofer tool altered the appearance of the website.
meanings.sent3: The spoofer program played a prank by changing all the text to emojis.
meanings.sent4: The spoofer tool was like a magician, tricking users with its illusions.
meanings.sent5: The spoofer software can be dangerous if used for malicious purposes.
